Articles.Content:
yah your welcome thought my military srunk ,but with help from the U.S i manage to get elite training for the 2k troops.

Edit:I need some troops please.Also I manage to get world war I surplus.

Edited June 10, 2013 by MGUARN
I sent 10k troops to your aid.
Was attacked, http://www.bloc.name/bloc/alliancestats.php?allianceid=9 there most powerful member. I'd recommend we just take them out as soon as we get military strength
I need about $100 to be able to prospect for oil.Also how can i grow again i stopped growing.
Welcome everybody. I'll answer any questions you have.
You need to buy oil to sustain your growth. You can buy it in Economic Policy. And how do I join your alliance?

Right now the leader of the allaince can only invite you.Just post your nations name here.I also found that out on the forums.

Edit: Monkey spy i made our alliance know for any Ksp player in the bloc forums if that's okay.

Edited June 15, 2013 by MGUARN
Mguarn, the thread looks very nice, but I noticed my nation is not listed with everyone else.

okay fix is on the way

Edit:what was the name?

Edited June 16, 2013 by MGUARN

I made a country. I need help on how to start now.

My country's name is Jupria.

Surimu-ka is the name. Thank you for fixing the issue.

Edited June 16, 2013 by Streamline
Here's mine http://bloc.name/bloc/stats.php?id=2846
Please go to the alliance page on the website to accept the invite.
I would like to join, my country is called Xiaoming.
back from my day of well blankness being that something caught fire then connections through th internet when to flames from there.(Internet blew up)
Everyone should be invited.
How to keep quality of life from dropping?
It'll always drop, the best way to keep it up is to keep buying hospitals and schools. There is no way to stop the drop of quality of life.
managed to privatize ,and increase quality of life.So everything in the U.S.K is going well.
Hey guys. How is everyone's nations doing?
I'd like to join this alliance. My country is Espir

I can not edit my own alliance, the hell is going on.

EDIT: Everything is back to normal, Espir has been invited

Edited June 28, 2013 by Monkthespy
dont worry the dev was doing things on the game. Btw my nation is doing well my market is free ,and growth at a stable 4%.
Anyone need some aid? .My nation is currently doing pretty well
